challenge: Decode ancient magical runes etched into a stone door
description: Glowing runes pulse with arcane energy across a sealed stone entrance. The symbols are written in an ancient magical language, their patterns suggesting both warning and invitation. Deciphering them requires deep knowledge of magical theory and historical linguistics.
success: Reveal the runes' meaning and the command word to safely open the door without triggering protective wards
failure: Misinterpret the runes and trigger a defensive ward that deals 2d8 force damage to everyone within 10 feet
